node.title: National Candy Day 2021: The Best Deals and Offers For Sweet-Toothed Fiends
node.alt: Hershey's Milk Chocolate bar. Hershey's is just one retailer offering deals for National Candy Day.
node.description: You may have already stocked up on candy thanks to Halloween's trick-or-treating, but many retailers have great deals this National Candy Day.
node.content:
["November 4 marks National Candy Day.", "Yes, only four days after Halloween, candy lovers have another occasion to celebrate.", "If you didn't get your fix of sweet things trick-or-treating, there are plenty of stores with great deals to mark the occasion.", "Here are some of the best offers for those with a sweet tooth.", "
Dylan's Candy Bar
", "Founded by daughter of Ralph Lauren, Dylan Lauren, this place has become a sanctuary for candy lovers.", "To celebrate National Candy Day, shoppers can enjoy 20 percent off across the entire online store including items in the sale.", "Stock up on holiday candy early, or pick up a bulk bag of Celestial Sours Candy for $6 and $1 of your purchase will support Catskill Animal Sanctuary.", "
Godiva
", "Belgian chocolatier Godiva may not have any dedicated National Candy Day deals, but is offering 20 percent off your first purchase if you sign up to its mailing list.", "In preparation for Black Friday, many items are already on sale with up to 25% off.", "Get three boxes of its Gold Collection Gift Set for $40.39.", "
Lindt
", "Another store for fans of good quality chocolate, Swiss chocolatier Lindt is offering shoppers 10 percent off orders of $75 or more, 20 percent off orders of $100 or more, and 30 percent off orders of $150 or more.", "Spend more than $70 to get free shipping.", "Items from its Halloween lines are also now on sale so you can get yourself a bargain like this gift bundle for $12.99.", "
M&Ms
", "If your heart belongs to M&Ms, you can get 10 percent off when you sign up for their email newsletter, 15% off Bulk/DIY kits and party favors, and free shipping on orders over $49.", "
Hershey's
", "", "
Hershey's Milk Chocolate bar. Hershey's is just one retailer offering deals for National Candy Day.
", "Hershey's is marking National Candy Day with 15 percent off sitewide.", "Spend over $75 to get free shipping on your order.", "
IT'SUGAR
", "For those with a serious sweet tooth, you can bag yourself a bargain on giant candy at IT'SUGAR.", "The store stocks supersized versions of popular favorites like Reese's Giant Cups and Hershey's Kisses, starting at $11.99.", "Currently, you can pick up two candy gift bags for $22 and get free ground shipping on orders over $50."]
